Hurl_Boulder.help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals high damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Fissure.help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe. Affected targets take moderate damage and may be thrown in the air and possibly Disoriented. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fissure.shortHelp: Close (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback, Disorient

Stone_Armor.help: Your skin becomes stone while this power is active. Stone Armor makes you highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal attacks. They are less likely to land and affect you. You must be level 41 and have Hurl Boulder or Fissure before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast
Stone_Armor.attackerHit: You are now more defensive to smashing and lethal attacks.

Seismic_Smash.help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. You must be level 41 and have Hurl Boulder or Fissure before selecting this power. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.targetHelp: You have been immobilized by the crushing earth.

Earths_Embrace.help: You are so connected to the Earth, you can draw upon its power to add to your own health. Activating this power increases your maximum Hit Points, and grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. You must be level 44 and have two other Stone Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Very Long
Earths_Embrace.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.
